hero.title: Welcome to Dirty Boots Café
hero.subtitle: Coffee, community, and crumbs of adventure.

sections.heading: A Life Well Walked
sections.text: We believe the best journeys end with good coffee, fresh bread, and stories shared under open skies.

sections.heading: Where to Find Us
sections.text: Our little café on wheels rolls into parks, markets, and open fields. Follow us — find a moment of warmth.

sections.heading: The Roost: Our Open-Door Bakehouse
sections.text: In the heart of our town, Dirty Boots Roost is more than a bakery — it's an invitation. Fresh bakes daily. Doors open wide. Events and workshops coming soon.
